00043 // ===========================================================================
00044 // static member variables
00045 // ===========================================================================
00046 SUMOTime MSLink::myLookaheadTime = TIME2STEPS(3);

00049 // ===========================================================================
00050 // member method definitions

00052 #ifndef HAVE_INTERNAL_LANES
00053 MSLink::MSLink(MSLane* succLane,
00054                LinkDirection dir, LinkState state,
00055                SUMOReal length)
00056     :
00057     myLane(succLane),
00058     myRequestIdx(0), myRespondIdx(0),
00059     myState(state), myDirection(dir),  myLength(length) {}
00060 #else
00061 MSLink::MSLink(MSLane* succLane, MSLane* via,
00062                LinkDirection dir, LinkState state, SUMOReal length)
00063     :
00064     myLane(succLane),
00065     myRequestIdx(0), myRespondIdx(0),
00066     myState(state), myDirection(dir), myLength(length),
00067     myJunctionInlane(via) {}
00068 #endif

00071 MSLink::~MSLink() {}

00074 void
00075 MSLink::setRequestInformation(unsigned int requestIdx, unsigned int respondIdx, bool isCrossing, bool isCont,
00076                               const std::vector<MSLink*> &foeLinks,
00077                               const std::vector<MSLane*> &foeLanes) {
00078     myRequestIdx = requestIdx;
00079     myRespondIdx = respondIdx;
00080     myIsCrossing = isCrossing;
00081     myAmCont = isCont;
00082     myFoeLinks = foeLinks;
00083     myFoeLanes = foeLanes;
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 void
00088 MSLink::setApproaching(SUMOVehicle* approaching, SUMOTime arrivalTime, SUMOReal speed, bool setRequest) {
00089     LinkApproachingVehicles::iterator i = find_if(myApproachingVehicles.begin(), myApproachingVehicles.end(), vehicle_in_request_finder(approaching));
00090     if (i != myApproachingVehicles.end()) {
00091         myApproachingVehicles.erase(i);
00092     }
00093     const SUMOTime leaveTime = arrivalTime + TIME2STEPS((approaching->getVehicleType().getLengthWithGap() + getLength()) / speed);
00094     ApproachingVehicleInformation approachInfo(arrivalTime, leaveTime, approaching, setRequest);
00095     myApproachingVehicles.push_back(approachInfo);
00096 }

00098 
00099 void
00100 MSLink::addBlockedLink(MSLink* link) {
00101     myBlockedFoeLinks.insert(link);
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 
00106 bool
00107 MSLink::willHaveBlockedFoe() const {
00108     for (std::set<MSLink*>::const_iterator i = myBlockedFoeLinks.begin(); i != myBlockedFoeLinks.end(); ++i) {
00109         if ((*i)->isBlockingAnyone()) {
00110             return true;
00111         }
00112     }
00113     return false;
00114 }
00115 
00116 
00117 void
00118 MSLink::removeApproaching(SUMOVehicle* veh) {
00119     LinkApproachingVehicles::iterator i = find_if(myApproachingVehicles.begin(), myApproachingVehicles.end(), vehicle_in_request_finder(veh));
00120     if (i != myApproachingVehicles.end()) {
00121         myApproachingVehicles.erase(i);
00122     }
00123 }

00125 
00126 bool
00127 MSLink::opened(SUMOTime arrivalTime, SUMOReal arrivalSpeed, SUMOReal vehicleLength) const {
00128     if (myState == LINKSTATE_TL_RED) {
00129         return false;
00130     }
00131     if (myAmCont) {
00132         return true;
00133     }
00134 #ifdef HAVE_INTERNAL_LANES
00135     const SUMOReal length = myJunctionInlane == 0 ? getLength() : myJunctionInlane->getLength();
00136 #else
00137     const SUMOReal length = getLength();
00138 #endif
00139     const SUMOTime leaveTime = arrivalTime + TIME2STEPS((length + vehicleLength) / arrivalSpeed);
00140     for (std::vector<MSLink*>::const_iterator i = myFoeLinks.begin(); i != myFoeLinks.end(); ++i) {
00141 #ifdef HAVE_MESOSIM
00142         if (MSGlobals::gUseMesoSim) {
00143             if ((*i)->getState() == LINKSTATE_TL_RED) {
00144                 continue;
00145             }
00146         }
00147 #endif
00148         if ((*i)->blockedAtTime(arrivalTime, leaveTime)) {
00149             return false;
00150         }
00151     }
00152     for (std::vector<MSLane*>::const_iterator i = myFoeLanes.begin(); i != myFoeLanes.end(); ++i) {
00153         if ((*i)->getVehicleNumber() > 0 || (*i)->getPartialOccupator() != 0) {
00154             return false;
00155         }
00156     }
00157     return true;
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 bool
00162 MSLink::blockedAtTime(SUMOTime arrivalTime, SUMOTime leaveTime) const {
00163     for (LinkApproachingVehicles::const_iterator i = myApproachingVehicles.begin(); i != myApproachingVehicles.end(); ++i) {
00164         if (!(*i).willPass) {
00165             continue;
00166         }
00167         if (!(((*i).leavingTime + myLookaheadTime < arrivalTime) || ((*i).arrivalTime - myLookaheadTime > leaveTime))) {
00168             return true;
00169         }
00170     }
00171     return false;
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00175 bool
00176 MSLink::hasApproachingFoe(SUMOTime arrivalTime, SUMOTime leaveTime) const {
00177     for (std::vector<MSLink*>::const_iterator i = myFoeLinks.begin(); i != myFoeLinks.end(); ++i) {
00178         if ((*i)->blockedAtTime(arrivalTime, leaveTime)) {
00179             return true;
00180         }
00181     }
00182     for (std::vector<MSLane*>::const_iterator i = myFoeLanes.begin(); i != myFoeLanes.end(); ++i) {
00183         if ((*i)->getVehicleNumber() > 0 || (*i)->getPartialOccupator() != 0) {
00184             return true;
00185         }
00186     }
00187     return false;
00188 }

00193     return myDirection;

00199     myState = state;
